sentences.en: Above a certain temperature, the enzyme molecule will become unfolded.
sentences.cn: 超过一定温度, 酶分子将会展开.

sentences.en: Apparently, though, CYP2E1 affects how sensitive the brain is to alcohol, perhaps because it —unlike the enzyme in the liver —generates free radicals, tiny molecules that can damage cells.
sentences.cn: 虽然表面上是这样，CYP2E1却影响着大脑对酒精的敏感度，或许因为它—不像在肝脏中的酶—产生了自由基，能损害细胞的微小分子。

sentences.en: Biochemists use kinetics to study rates of enzyme - catalyzed reactions.
sentences.cn: 生物化学家们应用动力学研究酶催化反应的速率.

sentences.en: Enzyme repression was discovered by Jacques Monod in 1953.
sentences.cn: 酶的阻遏作用是Monod于1953年发现的.

sentences.en: It is believed that it inhibits an enzyme that promotes cell proliferation in tumours.
sentences.cn: 据信它能抑制一种能在肿瘤中促进细胞增殖的酶的生成。

sentences.en: Lysozyme is an enzyme found in egg white, tears, and other secretions.
sentences.cn: 溶菌酶是存在于卵白 、 泪和其他分泌物中的一种酶.

sentences.en: Magnesium is involved as a cofactor in many enzyme transfers.
sentences.cn: 镁是许多酶转变的辅助因素.

sentences.en: Removal of the inducer results in immidiate cessation of enzyme synthesis.
sentences.cn: 除去诱导物就会立即终止酶的合成.

sentences.en: Serizyme, a standardized bacterial proteolytic enzyme, may be used.
sentences.cn: 丝胶酶是一种标准的细菌解朊酶, 也可以应用.

sentences.en: Tampering with a single enzyme can lead to untoward effects elsewhere.
sentences.cn: 破坏一种酶可能会导致在别处出现异常。

sentences.en: The enzyme cholinesterase is important in the transmission of nerve impulses.
sentences.cn: 胆碱酯酶在神经刺激的传导中起着重要作用.

sentences.en: The enzyme has been partially purified from muny bean shoots.
sentences.cn: 从绿豆幼苗中已部分地提纯了这种酶.

sentences.en: The enzyme he used is one of a broad class of enzymes that operate similarly on molecules like amino acids and nucleic acids, among others.
sentences.cn: 他所使用的酶是广谱酶类的一种，它们的关系正如其中的氨基酸和核苷酸一样，对分子起着类似的作用。

sentences.en: The enzyme immunoassay diagnostic procedure was first described in 1971.
sentences.cn: 酶免疫试验的诊断操作方法是于1971年首次描述的.

sentences.en: The pesticides affect the nervous system by inhibiting the enzyme cholinesterase.
sentences.cn: 这类农药抑制胆碱酯酶而影响神经系统.

sentences.en: This change is considered to be due to denaturation of the enzyme.
sentences.cn: 据认为这种变化是由于酶的变性作用造成的.

sentences.en: This decarboxylation is catalysed by the enzyme glutamic acid decarboxylase.
sentences.cn: 这个脱羧作用是由谷氨酸脱羧酶催化的.

sentences.en: This enzyme accumulates in the larvae to a level where it becomes toxic and kills them.
sentences.cn: 这种酶在幼虫体内积累到一定浓度，就会变得有毒并杀死它们。

sentences.en: This enzyme would make the filtration of beer easier.
sentences.cn: 这种酶会使啤酒更容易过滤。

phrases.tran_cn: 酶联免疫吸附测定，酶标法
蛋白酶；蛋白水解酶；解朊酶

trans.tran_en: a chemical substance that is produced in a plant or animal, and helps chemical changes to take place in the plant or animal
